accessModes.description:
AccessModes contains the desired access modes the volume should have.
More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes#access-modes-1

volumeMode.description:
VolumeMode defines what type of volume is required by the claim.
Value of Filesystem is implied when not included in claim spec.

cloneStrategy.description: CloneStrategy defines the preferred method for performing a CDI clone

dataImportCronSourceFormat.description: DataImportCronSourceFormat defines the format of the DataImportCron-created disk image sources

snapshotClass.description: SnapshotClass is optional specific VolumeSnapshotClass for CloneStrategySnapshot. If not set, a VolumeSnapshotClass is chosen according to the provisioner.
